snippet: As cloud computing grows, and security still lags far behind the layers of physical and network security of computer rooms down the hall, many start-ups are offering ways to encrypt information.
abstract: As cloud computing grows, and security still lags far behind the layers of physical and network security of computer rooms down the hall, many start-ups are offering ways to encrypt information.

headline.main: Security Needs Evolve as Computing Leaves the Office
headline.print_headline: Security Needs Evolve as Computing Leaves the Office
